''' Personal Goals : '''

 {*} Learn depth knowledge of the operating system, so you can enjoy all the comforts and advantages it offers.

 {*} Get other choice a free choise in operating systems.  for personal and work environment.

 {*} Achieve better management of the operating system to guide, assist, and involve others in the free software.

 {*} Help Ubuntu community, encouraging use of free software, as a truly useful tool that may be able to compete with any other software.

''' Objetives in Ubuntu and Ubuntu-CO : '''

 {*} Learn, support, assist, recommend, offer solutions, innovations, publications, provide and receive knowledge in the Ubuntu Community.
  
 {*} Being an active member in all activities that occur within the community, promote its development and contribute to the continued growth of the same.

 {*} Support and promote the growth of software spreading this through friends, social networks, community projects etc.

 {*} Organize, support and promote events in my city, and beyond, to captures the attention of new members or new projects raising awareness of the community.
